name: Logistics
description: Integrated logistics services including 3PL coordination, shunting, and transportation management across Eastern Ontario.
typicalUseCases: End-to-end supply chain support for manufacturers and distributors
Coordination of warehouse, shunting, and carrier activities

name: Shunting Services
description: On-site trailer shunting between docks, yards, and nearby facilities using dedicated power units and drivers.
typicalUseCases: Yard repositioning for manufacturing or packaging sites
Daily on-site trailer spotting and live-load support
features: Flexible scheduling (day shift, night shift, weekends)
Integration with customer yard rules and safety programs

name: Local Transfer & Shuttle
description: Short-haul, local transfer of trailers or freight between nearby customer locations and Wills facilities.
features: Flexible scheduling based on production cycles
Coordinated with warehouse receiving and shipping windows

name: Trailer Pool Management
description: Management of customer or carrier trailer pools across Wills and customer sites including inventory, positioning, and utilization tracking.
typicalUseCases: Managing shared trailer fleets between plants and warehouses
Ensuring the right number of empties and loaded trailers at each site

name: Yard Management Support
description: Support for planning and executing yard moves, dock assignments, and trailer flow at customer or Wills-operated sites.
typicalUseCases: Coordinating dock appointments and trailer positions
Reducing congestion and wait times on-site
features: Integration with WMS and scheduling tools
Alignment with safety and access control requirements
